typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ColID as integer,
		ColGUID as string,
		ColInt as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 derive(ColGUID = lower(ColGUID)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		unique as string,
		firstcol as string,
		seccol as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
